articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: In first person: John Romero reflects on over three decades as the “Doom guy” - Ars Technica
articles.description: Id Software co-founder talks to Ars about everything from Catacomb 3-D to "boomer shooters."
articles.content:

John Romero remembers the moment he realized what the future of gaming would look like.In late 1991, Romero and his colleagues at id Software had just released Catacomb 3-D, a crude-looking, EGA-… [+3046 chars]

articles.title: Mars Helicopter Ingenuity Spots Perseverance Rover During Flight 51 - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
articles.description: NASA's Mars helicopter Ingenuity flew for the 51st time. The Perseverance rover can be seen in the distance during the flight in an enhanced color image.   Credit: Space.com | footage courtesy: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta
